item.title: St. Michael's Hospital ED Nurse Assignment App
item.description: This post was originally posted here. Intro The St. Michael’s Hospital (SMH) Emergency Department (ED) is divided into clinical areas; each area has a requisite number of nurses. Each shift, nurses are assigned to work in a specific clinical area or a leadership role. This is known as the nurse assignment task. Optimal nurse assignment is essential for ensuring optimal patient care and improving staff satisfaction. The Problem Nurse assignment is a daily task at the SMH ED.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.

-- -- -- -- Hi! I'm David Dai. -- I’m a Data Scientist. I take data and extract information that can be used to reduce inefficiencies and improve outcomes. I am trained in applied statistics and machine learning. I have extensive experience in the healthcare sector, but am interested in a multitude of areas, including technology, education, and hockey analytics. When I’m not working, I enjoy fitness and watching the Toronto Maple Leafs.

item.title: Contact Me
item.description: If you’d like to chat about statistics, data science, machine learning, or something I’ve written about, send me a message! You can also find me on Linkedin and Twitter.
